properties.name: Boudicca's rebellion - 60 AD
properties.author: Haemimont Games
properties.description: Britannia, tired of Rome's arrogance, turns into a hot bed of turmoil.\nWhile governor Suetonius Paulinus suffocates the last revolt on the island of Anglesey, Boadicea, queen of the Iceni, heads towards the capital of the Roman province.\nDespite the imperial army's tenacious resistance, Boadicea makes her way with the sword...
